wikipedia_page.main: Abraham Montagu Lyons (10 February 1894 – 29 November 1961) was an English lawyer, judge, politician and author, who served as a Conservative member of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for Leicester East, and as Recorder of Great Grimsby.

response: At the subsequent election, Wise lost his seat to the Conservative Abraham Montagu Lyons.Leicester East (UK Parliament constituency)#Elections 1931–45
